attributes.comment:
Dear Sir:
I fully oppose any further increase of the USCIS fees. My busband Peter and I
have spent well over $12000.00 in adoption expenses and still have not received
our referral to date. We've been waiting for over 2 1/2 years.

We already had to redo our home study and our fingerprints and our medical
expenses which added on to the costs, take out another loan to fund this
adoption.

Because we had to file twice because of the 18 th months had passed for the 171
H approval, other expenses have been added to our unforseen costs.
Please keep the fees the same throughout the adoption process. It's not our fault
that China is taking so long.
Thanks,
Laura Puglia
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Laura Puglia
